participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Resilient and optimistic, Emily always tries to see the silver lining in difficult situations.
participant_1.background: i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i love playing softball. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, Jake values hands-on experience and loves to create and build.
participant_2.background: my dad taught me everything i know. i'm a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.
